original_text: One of the sons of Joiada son of Eliashib the high priest was son-in-law to Sanballat the Horonite. And I drove him away from me.
korean_text: 대제사장 엘리아십의 손자 요야다의 아들 하나가 호론 사람 산발랏의 사위가 되었으므로 내가 쫓아내어 나를 떠나게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: One of the sons of Joiada
son of Eliashib the high priest
was son-in-law to Sanballat the Horonite
And I drove him away from me
